title: This is unfair.
body:
You know how if you afk a few games you get the lower matchmade que? meaning you wait 10-20-30 minutes before being able to start a game?
Due to my internet cutting out 5 minutes before a game ends i got the 10 minute que timer.
My last game i just had i had 2 intentional feeders in a ranked game so i decide ill sit at base instead of playing for 12 minutes before they win, because who wants to vs a 7-0 fizz 5 6 minutes into the game?
Well now im in another penalty que where i wait 20 minutes before a game.
Have a way to stop people feeding instead of punishing me for not wanting to play with the shit that this game seems to bring in.

replies.body:
Why does your internet ONLY cut out five minutes before a game ends?


As for the AFKing in base you deserved that one without a doubt.
Seems to me like you've deserved your punishment. Quit AFKing and leaving games. Simple.
